title: BlackRock Adds Over $22 Billion in Crypto to Its Portfolio
description: By the end of 2025, BlackRock’s crypto holdings no longer looked like an experiment. The numbers told a steadier story. Bitcoin and Ethereum holdings climbed from $54.8 billion to $77.3 billion in a single year, a 41% increase that suggested planning rather than impulse. Bitcoin remained the anchor. That wasn’t surprising. Institutions tend to move […]The post BlackRock Adds Over $22 Billion in Crypto to Its Portfolio appeared first on ABC Money.
